name: Cubic complex
description: The game develops thinking and coordination. Collect all the keys on the map and find the exit. Use the second screen to find all the keys.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: core 2 duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia gt610 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek Aydio HD
